title: Shooting in Rockwall
content:
Rockwall police are investigating a shooting that occurred on Sunday.
Police were sent to Texas Health Presbyterian Hospital-Rockwall at 8:23 p.m. after receiving a report of a 17-year-old male arriving at the hospital with a gunshot wound.
Police were told the incident happened in the 2700 block of Faircrest Drive.
He was transferred by medical helicopter to Texas Health Presbyterian Hospital-Dallas where he was in stable condition Sunday night, according to a Rockwall Police Department official.
The department’s Criminal Investigation Division is investigating the shooting.
